name: Animal Crash
description:
Fire up your engine and race with cute animal cars in Animal Crush. There's a never a dull moment in this exciting racing game.

Set a new record!
Avoid getting hit by naughty animal cars, speed up and down to earn more points!
Use the cute animals' special abilities to set new records.

New racing game with the fun and wonder of AR(Augmented Reality).
With AR implemented, you will experience real driving anywhere. Whether you are in your house, on a park, or in your school!
However, you must have ARCore SDK installed to play with AR.

If you are having an issue with your camera, give the app permission to access your camera in app settings.
Game play data will be stored in the mobile device.

Please send game related inquiries to bi@bob.games.
